1011101111110011 1110100010111001 1 -> sum: 1010010010101101, cout: 1

0010111001001110 1101010100111101 0 -> sum: 0000001110001011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
